element.short: A series of measurements taken by a device
element.definition: A series of measurements taken by a device, with upper and lower limits. There may be more than one dimension in the data.
element.comment: The data is not interpretable without at least origin, period, and dimensions, but these are optional to allow a separation between the template of measurement and the actual measurement, such as between DeviceCapabilities and DeviceLog.  When providing a summary view (for example with Observation.value[x]) SampledData should be represented with a brief display text such as "Sampled Data".

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
